resources.string: %1$s is a mobile application that will allow students from primary and lower secondary general and technical secondary education in Cameroon to learn about the study streams and their specificities in order to develop by themselves individually fulfilling and socially profitable educational and vocational guidance projects. It is indeed an expert, semi-automated system which, thanks to an inference engine/calculation engine, will allow the user to formulate a correct educational and later vocational orientation.
